folder: Richmond Avenue & Orange Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
587 Richmond Avenue, east side, between Orange Avenue and Beekman Street, showing the rear of an old frame house which belonged to Mrs. Martling in 1874 and to the Captain John Wright Estate in 1898. The view is north from Orange Avenue.

May 21, 1932

P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Avenue & Orange Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
606-608 Richmond Avenue, west side, at Orange Avenue, showing St. Roch's Roman Catholic Church. On the right is the old church building, a small frame structure.

May 21, 1932

P. L. Sperr

(2)

The old St. Roch's Church, adjoining the new edifice, seen from the east side of Nicholas Avenue.

May 21, 1932

P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Avenue & Orange Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
620 Richmond Avenue, west side, between Orange Avenue and Seymour Avenue. The real estate maps of 1874 and 1898 show the house to have belonged to E. Simonson.

May 21, 1932

P. L. Sperr
